title: Linoqui
author: Linoqui
content: Support our Bookshop!We sell books related to cryptocurrency and blockchain. Our library caters to readers of all ages and proficiency levels who wish to delve into the intricate world of blockchain technology.You can access a vast collection of crypto and blockchain books for yourself, your family, friends, and kids! Our library features books on various topics, from blockchain basics and cryptocurrency trading to smart contracts, decentralized finance, and more. Whether you are a beginner or an expert in the field, our library has something for everyone.https://theblockpages.xyz/books/all-booksWe would also like to start a book club forum via Bitcointalk, to provide a space where readers could discuss their book purchases.Happy Reading!

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I get a lot of instability while browsing, some pages give me a lot of errors or I need some reload to work fine.Since you sell books, are there free open source books? And did you take the permission of the author before publishing or own the copyright, because I see a lot of paid books on your site, which is strange for a new site.The interface is nice, if  add find categories like beginner, kid, trading, technical it would be better.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on May 17, 2023, 09:50:50 AMSince you sell books, are there free open source books? And did you take the permission of the author before publishing or own the copyright, because I see a lot of paid books on your site, which is strange for a new site.I think most of the books related to Bitcoin and other crypto-currencies and the blockchain are copyrighted. It's is an obligatory act to get the permission of the copyright holder before selling e-copies of a book. The authors have put a lot of work in creating the content, and selling their work without their permission is against copyright law.However, if you have complete permission of the authors to list their e-books on your site then that's okay. I think the royalty sharing model works in such cases where the original authors get some percentage of the earnings generated by selling of their work. That way every author will get the rewards for their hard work.

comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on May 17, 2023, 09:50:50 AMI get a lot of instability while browsing, some pages give me a lot of errors or I need some reload to work fine.Since you sell books, are there free open source books? And did you take the permission of the author before publishing or own the copyright, because I see a lot of paid books on your site, which is strange for a new site.The interface is nice, if  add find categories like beginner, kid, trading, technical it would be better.Hi,Thank you for the feedback!Apologies for the error, it works good on my end.  If you come across it again could you take a screenshot of the error so that I could diagnose it appropriately?We have a contractual affiliation with Bookshop org. who own the copyright. An online storefront for blockchain related books has been curated by me on their site and we have been granted permission to add this collection to our site. I have personally ensured to select books that touch on a variety of industries influenced by blockchain technology, the list includes books from some of the most influential figures of the industry. We hope you like it!There are a few reputable open source book websites and we would love to integrate this into the design, as well as audiobooks. We want to ensure the site stays very easy to navigate, with information easy to find, especially for those new to the industry.It terms of categories currently there is: Blockchain, DeFi, NFT’s, Ethereum, Cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, DAO, Kids. More will be available as the library grows  We are still in the beginning stages so your feedback is very appreciated, you can subscribe to stay updated of any changes and follow our journey. Just navigate to the end of the page and add your email: https://theblockpages.xyz/Thanks again!
